properties.areaDesc: Michigan City IN to New Buffalo MI; New Buffalo MI to St Joseph MI
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 14 at 2:43PM EST until January 14 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Northern Indiana
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a
Gale Watch, which is in effect from Wednesday evening through
Thursday morning.

* WINDS...West 10 to 15 knots. Gusts to 25 knots into this
evening. Wednesday evening winds will build to 15 to 25 knots
with gusts up to 30 knots. Occasional gales of 35 knots are
possible.

* WAVES...2 to 4 feet. Wednesday afternoon waves will build 3 to 5
feet before building 5 to 10 feet occasionally 13 ft overnight.
properties.instruction:
A small craft advisory means that sustained winds or frequent
gusts of 22 to 33 knots are likely...and/or waves greater than
4 feet are expected. Inexperienced mariners...especially those
operating smaller vessels should avoid navigating in these
conditions.

A Gale Watch is issued when the risk of gale force winds of 34 to
47 knots has significantly increased...but the specific timing
and/or location is still uncertain. It is intended to provide
additional lead time for mariners who may wish to consider
altering their plans.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM EST THIS EVENING... ...GALE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING
